entityType.description: The type of entity for the group provider.

billingContactSameAsEnrollment.description: Indicates if the billing contact is the same as the enrollment contact.
Indicates if the billing contact is different from the enrollment contact.

acceptingNewPatients.description: Indicates if the provider is currently accepting new patients.

ageRange.description: The age range of the patients that will be treated at the service location.

participatingServices.description: Type of service the provider participates in. 'FFS' for Fee-For-Service participants, 'MCO' for Managed Care Organization participants, or 'FFS_AND_MCO' if the provider accepts both.

telehealthOnly.description: Indicates if the service location provides only telehealth services.

culturalCompetenceTrainingCompleted.description: Indicates if the staff have completed cultural competence training.

LocationHours.description: Specifies the operating hours of the facility. If open 24/7, no day/hour objects are required.

open24Hours.description: The facility is open 24/7. No other hours need to be specified.
The facility is not open 24/7. Specific hours must be provided.

sameAsServiceLocation.description: Indicates that this address is the same as the service location.
Indicates that this address is different from the service location and must be specified.

reason.description: The reason for SDAT not being available.

providerType.description: The type of provider for the affiliation.
The type of provider for the affiliation.

rosterDownloaded.description: Indicates if the roster has been downloaded.

rosterUploaded.description: Indicates if the roster has been uploaded.

boardOrAuthority.description: The license board or authority who issued the license.

CLIAExplanation.description: Explanations if CLIA is not available.

CLIACertificates.description: Array of CLIA certificates if hasCLIA is true.

explanation.description: Explanation for why DEA certificate was not attached.

DEACertificates.description: Array of DEA certificates if hasDEACertificate is true.

explanation.description: Explanation if lab permit is not available.

labPermitLetters.description: Array of lab permit certificates if hasLabPermit is true.

permitNumber.description: The permit number for the laboratory.
